Retrieves the details of a HubVirtualNetworkConnection.

Azure REST API version: 2024-05-01.

Other available API versions: 2023-02-01.

These versions are not included in the SDK but you can generate them as a local SDK package; see the [version guide](../../../version-guide/#accessing-any-api-version-via-local-packages) for details.




## Using getHubVirtualNetworkConnection {#using}

Two invocation forms are available. The direct form accepts plain
arguments and either blocks until the result value is available, or
returns a Promise-wrapped result. The output form accepts
Input-wrapped arguments and returns an Output-wrapped result.

    <dd>The list of references to HubBgpConnection objects.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="staticroutes_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#staticroutes_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">static<wbr>Routes</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#staticrouteresponse">List&lt;Property Map&gt;</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>List of all Static Routes.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="staticroutesconfig_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#staticroutesconfig_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">static<wbr>Routes<wbr>Config</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#staticroutesconfigresponse">Property Map</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Configuration for static routes on this HubVnetConnection.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
</div>
